user.title: Configure Torque Integration
user.description: Set up your Torque OBD application integration. The API endpoint will be available at `/api/torque`. Configure your Torque app to send data to this endpoint.

data_description.email: Email address used in your Torque app (used for authentication)
data_description.name: A friendly name for your vehicle (default: vehicle)

init.title: Torque Integration Options
init.description: Configure advanced options for your Torque integration.

data_description.hide_pids: Comma-separated list of PID numbers to hide (e.g., 41,42,43)
data_description.rename_map: Rename sensors using PID:Name format (e.g., 41:Engine Load,42:Coolant Temp)
data_description.unit_system: Choose between metric and imperial units
